channel.title: After affects
channel.description:
What is the point of adobe after affects... I dont know if I should get or not.
Positive comments please.
And no I'm not downloading it illegally.

item.title: After affects
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Who ever says Sony Vegas is better than After Effects is a fucktard. After Effects is powerful and has much more potential to create than Sony Vegas does. Some people just don’t have the patients to learn their way around AE.

Premiere also kills sony Vegas

You’re a Photoshop maniac! :o

item.title: After affects
item.dc:creator: @Beebee.Dodson Beebee.Dodson
item.description:
@Beebee.Dodson wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:13, topic:432679”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=535390.msg3915870#msg3915870 date=1329174254]

Wait, doesn’t Adobe also have a video manipulator called Premiere pro?
[/quote]Premiere Elements.

No, Premiere Pro does exist. Premiere Elements is the dumbed down version.

True that.

14c63kj.png275×632

After effects can do stuff like this therefore it is cool (starts at 1:20 ish):

Iirc after effects is more for special effects whereas premiere pro is just for general editing and cropping etc.[/quote]

You’re a Photoshop maniac! :o
Nobody has all those, and doesn’t have a slow computer.

Read full topic

item.description:

After effects can do stuff like this therefore it is cool (starts at 1:20 ish):
yout.ube.com/watch?v=-ZM4Hkw5CPk

Iirc after effects is more for special effects whereas premiere pro is just for general editing and cropping etc.
[/quote]GIVE ME YOUR TORRENTED CS5 PL0X

… Actually wasn’t torrented.

Downloaded the trial and cracked it yo!
[/quote]I CALL LIES!!! (unless you gimme it) :|[/quote]
Should be still on Adobe site to try as a trial?

item.title: After affects
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:432679”][quote author=kronixz link=topic=535390.msg3914242#msg3914242 date=1329017838]

it’s a complicated program, I mean Why are yu getting it?
For what reason?
and @ shane no it is not just a video editor

Because my grandma(don’t troll) got this cd with all this anti-malware stuff then I saw adobe after affects thing. So I’m like damn. Free ‘real’ version. So I’m wondering if I should snatch it from her.
[/quote]serial in pm naio! <3

but adobe after effects is a very advanced movie editor. It’s great for those video artists who know what they are doing.[/quote]
Oh great. Pm me if u want the serial.

Read full topic
